silent-vigil.title: Silent Vigil
steps: Sit before a pillar or chapel plaque.
Attend to tone, glyph, light without forcing.
Open presence — the ‘door’ into the Temple Realm.

furnace-breath.title: Furnace Breath
steps: Align breath to one of 7 alchemical phases.
Exhale fire for Calcination, stillness for Coagulation.
